description.french: Tous les succès obtenus. Félicitations !
description.italian: Ottenuti tutti gli obiettivi! Congratulazioni!
description.spanish: Has obtenido todos los logros. ¡Enhorabuena!
description.schinese: 恭喜得到所有成就！
description.tchinese: 恭喜得到所有成就！
description.japanese: 全ての実績を得る。おめでとう！
description.brazilian: Todas as conquistas foram alcançadas. Parabéns!

description.german: Erreiche das Ende von "Das Band des Feuers".
description.french: Terminer le jeu en choisissant la fin "Entretenir le Feu".
description.italian: Raggiungi la fine del capitolo "Il Legame del Fuoco".
description.spanish: Llega al final de "Enlazar el Fuego".
description.schinese: 完成“火的继承者”的结局
description.tchinese: 完成「火的繼承者」的結局
description.japanese: 「火を継ぐ者」のエンディングに到達する
description.brazilian: Alcance o final de "O Acender do Fogo".

description.german: Erreiche das Ende von "Der Finstere Fürst".
description.french: Terminer le jeu en choisissant la fin "Le Seigneur sombre".
description.italian: Raggiungi la fine del capitolo "Il Lord Oscuro".
description.spanish: Llega al final de "El Señor Oscuro".
description.schinese: 完成“黑暗之王”的结局
description.tchinese: 完成「黑暗之王」的結局
description.japanese: 「闇の王」のエンディングに到達する
description.brazilian: Alcance o final de "O Lorde Negro".

description.french: Obtenir toutes les armes rares.
description.italian: Acquisisci tutte le armi rare.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las armas raras.
description.schinese: 取得所有稀有武器
description.tchinese: 取得所有稀有武器
description.japanese: 全ての珍しい武器を入手する
description.brazilian: Adquira todas as armas raras.

description.french: Obtenir tous les sorts.
description.italian: Acquisisci tutte le stregonerie.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los hechizos.
description.schinese: 取得所有的魔法
description.tchinese: 取得所有的魔法
description.japanese: 全ての魔術を入手する
description.brazilian: Adquira todos os feitiços.

description.french: Obtenir toutes les pyromancies.
description.italian: Acquisisci tutte le piromanzie.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las piromancias.
description.schinese: 取得所有的咒术
description.tchinese: 取得所有的咒術
description.japanese: 全ての呪術を入手する
description.brazilian: Adquira todas as piromancias.

description.french: Obtenir tous les miracles.
description.italian: Acquisisci tutti i miracoli.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los milagros.
description.schinese: 取得所有的奇迹
description.tchinese: 取得所有的奇蹟
description.japanese: 全ての奇跡を入手する
description.brazilian: Adquira todos os milagres.

description.french: Trouver le serment de la Voie immaculée.
description.italian: Scopri il Patto della Via Bianca.
description.spanish: Descubre el pacto Blanca Vía.
description.schinese: 发现誓约“白教”
description.tchinese: 發現誓約「白教」
description.japanese: 誓約「白教」を見出す
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto do Caminho Branco.

description.french: Trouver le serment du Garde de la Princesse.
description.italian: Scopri il Patto della Guardia della Principessa.
description.spanish: Descubre el pacto Guardia de la princesa.
description.schinese: 发现誓约“公主的守护者”
description.tchinese: 發現誓約「公主的守護者」
description.japanese: 誓約「王女の守り」を見出す
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto da Guarda da Princesa.

displayName.french: Serment : Lame de la Lune noire
displayName.spanish: Pacto: Espada de la Luna Oscura

description.english: Discover Blade of the Darkmoon covenant.
description.french: Trouver le serment de la Lame de la Lune noire.
description.italian: Scopri il Patto della Lama della Luna Oscura.
description.spanish: Descubre el pacto Espada de la Luna Oscura.

description.japanese: 誓約「暗月の剣」を見出す

displayName.japanese: 目覚ましの鐘（不死教会）

description.english: Ring Bell of Awakening at Undead Church.
description.german: Läute die Glocke der Erweckung in der Kirche der Untoten.
description.french: Faire sonner la Cloche de l'éveil à l'Église des Mort-vivants.
description.italian: Suona la Campana del Risveglio nella Chiesa dei Non Morti.
description.koreana: 불사의 교회에 있는 자각의 종을 울린다
description.spanish: Toca la campana del Despertar de la Iglesia de los No Muertos.
description.schinese: 敲响不死教堂的苏醒之钟
description.tchinese: 敲響不死教堂的甦醒之鐘
description.japanese: 不死教会にある目覚ましの鐘を鳴らす
description.polish: Zadzwoń Dzwonem Przebudzenia w Kościele Nieumarłych.
description.brazilian: Soe o Sino do Despertar na Igreja dos Mortos-vivos.

displayName.schinese: 苏醒之钟（克拉格的住处）
displayName.tchinese: 甦醒之鐘（克菈格的住處）
displayName.japanese: 目覚ましの鐘（クラーグの住処）

description.english: Ring Bell of Awakening in Quelaag's domain.
description.german: Läute die Glocke der Erweckung in Quelaags Sphäre.
description.french: Faire sonner la Cloche de l'éveil dans le domaine de Quelaag.
description.italian: Suona la Campana del Risveglio nel Dominio di Quelaag.
description.koreana: 쿠라그의 소굴에 있는 자각의 종을 울린다
description.spanish: Toca la campana del Despertar en los Dominios de Quelaag.
description.schinese: 敲响克拉格住处的苏醒之钟
description.tchinese: 敲響克菈格住處的甦醒之鐘
description.japanese: クラーグの住処にある目覚ましの鐘を鳴らす
description.polish: Zadzwoń Dzwonem Przebudzenia w królestwie Quelaag.
description.brazilian: Soe o Sino do Despertar no Domínio de Quelaag.

description.french: Acquérir l'Art de l'Embrasement.
description.italian: Acquisisci l'Arte dell'Accensione.
description.spanish: Consigue el Rito del Avivado.
description.schinese: 取得注火的秘密仪式
description.tchinese: 取得注火的祕密儀式
description.japanese: 注ぎ火の秘儀を入手する
description.brazilian: Adquira o Rito de Acendimento.

displayName.spanish: Arte de Caminar por el Abismo

description.french: Acquérir l'Art de la Marche-abysses.
description.italian: Acquisisci l'Arte del Cammino Abissale.
description.spanish: Consigue el Arte de Caminar por el Abismo.
description.schinese: 取得漫步深渊技艺
description.tchinese: 取得漫步深淵技藝
description.japanese: 深淵歩きの業を入手する
description.brazilian: Adquira a Arte de Trilhar o Abismo.

displayName.japanese: アノール・ロンド到達

description.french: Arriver à Anor Londo.
description.italian: Raggiungi Anor Londo.
description.spanish: Llega a Anor Londo.
description.schinese: 到达亚诺尔隆德
description.tchinese: 到達亞諾爾隆德
description.japanese: アノール・ロンドに到達する
description.brazilian: Chegue a Anor Londo.

description.french: Obtenir le Calice royal.
description.italian: Acquisisci il Ricettacolo dei Lord.
description.spanish: Consigue la Vasija del Señor.
description.schinese: 取得王器
description.tchinese: 取得王器
description.japanese: 王の器を入手する
description.brazilian: Adquira a Urna do Lorde.

displayName.french: Vaincre le Seigneur des tombes Nito
displayName.brazilian: Derrota de Nito Lorde das Tumbas

description.english: Defeat the Soul Lord Gravelord Nito.
description.french: Vaincre Nito, Seigneur des Âmes et des tombes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Lord dell'Anima Nito il Re Tombale.
description.spanish: Derrota al Señor de Almas Nito, el Rey del Cementerio.
description.schinese: 击败灵魂之王“墓王尼特”
description.tchinese: 擊敗靈魂之王「墓王尼特」
description.russian: Сразить Великую Душу Нито Повелителя Могил.
description.japanese: ソウルの王「墓王ニト」を撃破する
description.brazilian: Derrote Nito Lorde das Tumbas, um dos Lordes das Almas.

description.english: Defeat the Soul Lord Bed of Chaos.
description.german: Besiege die Seelenfürstin Chaoswesen von Izalith.
description.french: Vaincre le Seigneur des Âmes Foyer du chaos.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Lord dell'Anima, Culla del Caos.
description.spanish: Derrota al Señor de Almas Lecho del Caos.
description.schinese: 击败灵魂之王“混沌的温床”
description.tchinese: 擊敗靈魂之王「渾沌的溫床」
description.japanese: ソウルの王「混沌の苗床」を撃破する
description.brazilian: Derrote o Berço do Caos, um dos Lordes das Almas.

description.english: Defeat the Four Kings, inheritors of souls.
description.german: Besiege die Vier Könige, die Seelenerben.
description.french: Vaincre les Quatre Rois, héritiers d'âmes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi i Quattro Re, eredi delle anime.
description.spanish: Derrota a los Cuatro Reyes, herederos de almas.
description.schinese: 击败分得灵魂之王“小隆德四王”
description.tchinese: 擊敗分得靈魂之王「小隆德四王」
description.japanese: 分け与えられたソウルの王「四人の公王」を撃破する
description.brazilian: Derrote os Quatro Reis, herdeiros de almas.

description.english: Defeat Seath the Scaleless, inheritors of souls.
description.german: Besiege Seath den Schuppenlosen, den Seelenerben.
description.french: Vaincre Seath l'écorché, héritier d'âmes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Seath il Senzascaglie, erede delle anime.
description.spanish: Derrota a Seath el Descamado, heredero de almas.
description.schinese: 击败分得灵魂之王“白龙希斯”
description.tchinese: 擊敗分得靈魂之王「白龍希斯」
description.japanese: 分け与えられたソウルの王「白竜シース」を撃破する
description.brazilian: Derrote Seath, o Descamado, herdeiro de almas.

displayName.schinese: 击败神“黯影太阳葛温德林”
displayName.tchinese: 擊敗神「黯影太陽葛溫德林」
displayName.japanese: 神の撃破「陰の太陽グウィンドリン」

description.english: Defeat Dark Sun Gwyndolin, the Darkmoon God.
description.french: Vaincre le Soleil noir Gwendolin, dieu de la Lune noire.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Gwendolin il Sole Oscuro, dio della Luna Oscura.
description.koreana: 암월의 신, 검은 태양 그윈돌린을 격파한다
description.spanish: Derrota a Gwyndolin el Sol Oscuro, el Dios de la Luna Oscura.
description.schinese: 击败暗月之神“黯影太阳葛温德林”
description.tchinese: 擊敗暗月之神「黯影太陽葛溫德林」
description.japanese: 暗月の神「陰の太陽グウィンドリン」を撃破する
description.polish: Pokonaj Gwyndolina Mroczne Słońce, boga Mrocznego Księżyca.
description.brazilian: Derrote Gwyndolin Sol Negro, o Deus da Lua Negra.

displayName.japanese: 神の撃破「半竜プリシラ」

description.german: Besiege das Mischwesen Priscilla, die Todesgöttin.
description.french: Vaincre Priscilla la Métissée, déesse de la Mort.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Priscilla Mezzosangue, la dea della morte.
description.spanish: Derrota a Priscilla la Mestiza, la Diosa de la Muerte.
description.schinese: 击败猎命“半龙普利希拉”
description.tchinese: 擊敗獵命「半龍普利希拉」
description.japanese: 生命狩り「半竜プリシラ」を撃破する
description.brazilian: Derrote Priscilla Mestiça, a Sorvedora de Vidas.
